short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mox Tutor tools in your browser :)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is the official Chrome extension for the moxtutor.com website.

The "Mox Tutor" extension popup has a button to import decks from supported third-party websites.

To use the extension, simply go to the website and find a deck you like. Then open the extension, and click on the "Import Deck" button.

You can also search for cards by using the "Search cards" input from the popup.

Enjoy :)
